text: Lay slumber on Ioues fierie eyes: that I may comfort me
With his embraces.
Shed thy soft Dews on Jove's immortal Eyes,
While sunk in Love's entrancing Joys he lies.
Seal for me fast the radiant eyes of Jove
In the instant of his gratified desire.
Close immediately in sleep for me the bright eyes of Jove under his eyelids, after I couch with him in love;
Close
The glorious eyes of Jove beneath his lids
Midst our embracings,
Seal up the sparkling eyes of mighty Jove
When he with me reclines in love's embrace,
Close Jove’s keen eyes for me in slumber while I hold him clasped in my embrace.
Lull me to sleep the bright eyes of Zeus beneath his brows, so soon as I shall have lain me by his side in love.
Lull me the bright eyes of Zeus under his brows as soon as I shall have lain by his side in love.
Seal the bright eyes of Zeus for me in sleep, directly I have lain in love with him.
Put to sleep the shining eyes of Zeus under his brows
as soon as I have lain beside him in love.
I want you to wait until Zeus and I have performed the act of love, then you must settle on his shining eyes and softly close their lids!
Lull to sleep the shining,
Brow-shaded eyes of Zeus, as soon as I’ve lain
With him and made love.
Lull
to sleep for me the shining eyes of Zeus
as soon as I lie down with him in love.
Close Zeus’ shining eyes in sleep under his brows, as soon as I have lain in love beside him.
Put Zeus to sleep for me! Seal his shining eyes
as soon as I’ve gone to bed with him, locked in love.
Lull Zeus’ bright eyes to sleep for me
As soon as I lie beside him in love.
Lull Zeus’s radiant eyes to sleep for me,
when I’m stretched out for sex beside him.
As soon as I lie down in Zeus’s arms, close his gleaming eyes in slumber.
Lull Zeus’ shining eyes to sleep under his brows for me,
as soon as I have lain down in love next to him
Seal Zeus’s eyes in slumber beneath his eyelids
as soon as we have made love.
Make drowsy for me Zeus’s bright eyes beneath his brows
the moment I’m through with lying beside him in love.
For my sake, lull to sleep those two bright eyes beneath the brows of Zeus,
mmediately after I have lain beside him in making love.
Lull the shining eyes,
of Zeus, as soon as I have lain with him,
when we have finished making love.
